definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="61" y="114"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:leeching_weapons</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Weapon Effects:</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§91 HP healed on every hit</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§92 HP healed when below 25% HP</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§cHealing Cooldown: 1s</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§8Press Shift for more details</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
